Package org.apache.sling.discovery.oak

Class Config

java.lang.Object
org.apache.sling.discovery.oak.Config
All Implemented Interfaces:
BaseConfig, DiscoveryLiteConfig
public class Config extends Object implements BaseConfig, DiscoveryLiteConfig
Configuration object used as a central config point for the discovery service implementation

The properties are described below under.
